price: Hai kaumku, inilah unta betina dari Allah, sebagai mukjizat (yang menunjukkan kebenaran) untukmu; sebab itu biarkanlah dia makan di bumi Allah dan janganlah kamu mengganggunya dengan gangguan apa pun yang akan menyebabkan kamu ditimpa azab yang dekat".
arabic: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ هَٰذِهِۦ نَاقَةُ ٱللَّهِ لَكُمۡ ءَايَةٗۖ فَذَرُوهَا تَأۡكُلۡ فِيٓ أَرۡضِ ٱللَّهِۖ وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوٓءٖ فَيَأۡخُذَكُمۡ عَذَابٞ قَرِيبٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayāqawmi hādhihi nāqatu al-lahi lakum āyatan fadharūhā takul fī arḍi al-lahi walā tamassūhā bisūin fayakhudhakum ʿadhābun qarībun
